item.title: RiTeK: A Dataset for Large Language Models Complex Reasoning over Textual Knowledge Graphs
item.description:
https://arxiv.org/abs/2410.13987
RiTeK is a dataset designed for Large Language Models to facilitate complex reasoning over Textual Knowledge Graphs, particularly in the medical domain, by synthesizing realistic user queries and introducing a Relational Monte Carlo Tree Search method to enhance relational path retrieval and inference capabilities.
